trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event occurs when a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> is added or removed from a managed collection of such lists.
trans-unit.target: Een <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>gebeurtenis treedt op wanneer een <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>is toegevoegd of verwijderd uit een beheerde verzameling van dergelijke lijsten.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>

trans-unit.source: This event is not raised when an individual list element changes its value.
trans-unit.target: Deze gebeurtenis is niet gestart als een afzonderlijke list-element de waarde ervan wordt gewijzigd.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event is generated by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> class when its <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Clear%2A> methods are executed.
trans-unit.target: De <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>gebeurtenis wordt gegenereerd door de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>klasse wanneer de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>, en <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Clear%2A>methoden worden uitgevoerd.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Clear%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseert een nieuw exemplaar van de <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event, the `relatedObject` parameter will always reference the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Voor de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>gebeurtenis, de `relatedObject` parameter altijd verwijst naar de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>die de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>is gekoppeld.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>

trans-unit.source: The object that is associated with the collection.
trans-unit.target: Het object dat is gekoppeld aan de verzameling.

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> has been added or removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Een waarde die aangeeft of een <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> is toegevoegd of verwijderd uit de verzameling.

trans-unit.source: The collection of list elements after the action has been applied.
trans-unit.target: De verzameling van elementen nadat de actie is toegepast.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> objects associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee wordt de verzameling <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> objecten gekoppeld aan deze gebeurtenis.

trans-unit.source: The retrieved <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> represents the state of the collection after the event, which involved adding or removing an element, has been applied.
trans-unit.target: De opgehaalde <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>vertegenwoordigt de status van de verzameling na het toepassen van de gebeurtenis, die betrokken toevoegen of verwijderen van een element,.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> that represents the current state of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Een <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> die staat voor de huidige status van de verzameling.

trans-unit.source: Gets a flag indicating whether an element has been added or removed from the collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Met deze eigenschap wordt een vlag die aangeeft of een element is toegevoegd of verwijderd uit de verzameling van <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> objecten.

trans-unit.source: Altering the contents of an existing <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> in the collection will not raise a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Wijzigen van de inhoud van een bestaande <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>in de verzameling niet verhoogt een <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>gebeurtenis.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedType"></xref> that indicates the type of change.
trans-unit.target: Een <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedType"> </xref> die aangeeft dat het type wijziging.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that that is associated with the collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee wordt het object dat is gekoppeld aan de verzameling van <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> objecten.

trans-unit.source: The RelatedObject property enables the programmer to associate an object to an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: De eigenschap RelatedObject kunt de programmeurs koppelen van een object met een exemplaar van de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs>klasse.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event, the RelatedObject property should always reference the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=fullName> that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Voor de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>gebeurtenis, de eigenschap RelatedObject moet altijd verwijzen naar de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=fullName>die de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>is gekoppeld.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>
De <xref:System.Object>die zijn gekoppeld aan de beheerde <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>
